detail_desc: Long hoodie in supersoft jersey with a brushed finish. Double-layered, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long hoodie in supersoft jersey with a brushed finish. Double-layered, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping jersey. High waist with concealed elastication and a wide seam centre front to create a draped effect. Unlined.

Top in soft, striped cotton jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.

Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved jumper in soft, jacquard-knit organic cotton with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slit at the front. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and flared hems. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric. Relaxed fit with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Leather loafers with fabric linings, leather insoles, and chunky, patterned soles.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and hard-worn details. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.

Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with sections in contrasting fabric front and back. Long sleeves with wide ribbing and thumbholes, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
High-waisted cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
High-waisted cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Oversized jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Lined.

Boots in imitation leather with wedge heels, a loop at the back and a zip at the front. Recycled polyester linings and imitation leather insoles.
Dress in printed organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and a seam and flared flounce at the hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in an airy viscose and cotton weave with a collar and V-neck opening at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an asymmetric seam with gathers at the waist for added width. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a sweetheart neckline and gathered seams at the shoulders and under the bust for a gently draping effect. Short puff sleeves with a jersey lining and concealed elastication at the hems for added volume. Concealed zip at the back and a jersey-lined skirt. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.

Short puff sleeves with a jersey lining and concealed elastication at the hems for added volume. Concealed zip at the back and a jersey-lined skirt. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.

Block-coloured cardigan in soft cotton with stripes knitted in different knit styles. Buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in lace with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a skirt with a gathered seam for added volume and width. V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Short dress in lace with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a skirt with a gathered seam for added volume and width. V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
A-line strappy top in a jacquard weave with a small opening at the back. Narrow cut at the top with a frill trim and drawstring at the top that ties at the back of the neck. Lined.

Short dress woven in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell blend with a deep V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and a pleated skirt. Short puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning and a frill trim. V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Short dress woven in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell blend with a deep V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and a pleated skirt. Short puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning and a frill trim. V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Necklace of two different metal chains, one with a rod-shaped pendant and one with a pendant in the shape of a feather. Adjustable length.

Trainers with details in imitation leather and mesh, a padded top edge and grosgrain loop at the back. Padded tongue and lacing with reflective details. Piqué linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles. The polyester content of the trainers is partly recycled.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Short dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and recycled polyester blend. Dropped shoulders, long, voluminous balloon sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short satin dressing gown with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Wrapover front with concealed ties at one side and a sewn-on tie belt at the waist.
